front.title: Raithal Operative
front.gametext: While at a Raithal site: adds 1 to your Force drains there, is power +1 (or +2 if your gambler or tax collector is on Raithal) and, once during each of your deploy phases, may deploy one site to Raithal from Reserve Deck- reshuffle.
front.lore: Opportunists work with corrupt governments and Raithal casino operators. Keep the Empire informed of local Alliance activity, for a price.
